sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the elements copy, download, move and unpack. .

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element destination is used to specify the name of the destination file or directory when processing a copy, move or unpack element.
It is also used to specify the path of the destination directory when processing a download element.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.para: The first example is an unpack command.
sect2.programlisting: echo Unpacking /usr/src/lfs-packages/gzip.1.2.4a.tar.gz into /usr/src cd /usr/src tar xzvf /usr/src/lfs-packages/gzip.1.2.4a.tar.gz
sect2.para: The second example is a copy command.
sect2.programlisting: echo Copying 'config.txt into /opt/mypackage/config.txt' cd /usr/src/mypackage cp -f config.txt /opt/mypackage/config.txt
